node.title: When I am bored, I usually...
node.author: lima1

data.field: write some obfuscated code write some cool but completely useless modules like Lingua::Romana::Perligata inhabit the Chatterbox write a three page answer to the newest Hash-of-Hashes question start some flamewars on [http://slashdot.org|Slashdot] reload my favorite news page every 5 seconds to make sure I am the first to read the newest article play a tetris clone
